Row.Text: Rich Vein

A rich vein of blue marble was discovered at the quarry near the city. Your miners and masons have come to you to ask you what you would like to do with it.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Choose from the options below...
Boast of this, and merchants will come to buy it from us.
+{2_InstantYield}, and 10 turns (scaling with game speed) of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]We Love the King Day[ENDCOLOR] in the City.
Donate it to the Temple.
{2_InstantYield}.
Carve relics and idols from it.
{2_InstantYield}
Give it to our finest artists.
+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the City for {5_Turns}.
Mining Accident
The mines near the City have become increasingly unstable, and a major cave-in is feared to be real possiblity. What do you want us to do?
Collapse the tunnels to preserve what we can.
Bury the compromised branches of the Mine. They enter a the Pillaged state.
Reassign engineers from the City to close-off the breach with minimal loss of tunnel access.
Delay the City's current building project by {1_YieldCost} but save the Mine.
I don't have time to deal with this.
You decide not to deal with this. Engineers tell you there is a 20% chance that the mines could collapse, leading to damage and loss of life.
There has been a mine collapse near {2_City}. 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen has been lost and up to three mines have been destroyed.
Mining disaster near {2_City}!
Market Day
Market Day has begun, and the City's marketplace is filled with customers. For the next {5_Turns}, the City's Market produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Nomadic Incursion

A group of nomadic peoples have appeared at your borders and petition for the right to settle in your territory. They seem friendly and are willing to negotiate in order to gain what they desire. How do you respond?
Give them land, but only if they accept our governance.
The nomads settle just outside the City resulting in {2_Instant}.
Drive them out, and steal whatever we can take.
Receive {1_Cost}. 50% chance that two Barbarian units will spawn near the City.
Invite them to settle, but only if their finest soldiers join our army.
A free military Unit spawns near your City.
Invite them to integrate into the City.
There is a 75% chance that the City will gain 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen.
Provide them refuge, but only if they adapt to our culture.
The settlers bring artifacts with them resulting in {2_Instant}.
They seem friendly. Let them join our workforce.
One new Worker appears near the City.
Your brazen actions angered the nomads, and they have declared war on you! Two Barbarian units spawn near {2_City}.
Nomadic retaliation against {2_City}!
The nomads have accepted your offer and agreed to become part of your empire. {2_City} has gained 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen.
{2_City} attracts a new Citizen!
A Glint in the Darkness

While searching an unexplored tunnel, a worker in the City's Mines thought they saw a strange light coming from deep within the cave. The miners are too afraid to continue working there.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Who shall we send to investigate this?[NEWLINE]
We have dug too deep. We should send our wisest elder to bargain with the spirits we have clearly disturbed.
The old man exits the Mine unscathed! It's a miracle! Gain a boost of {2_InstantYield}.
We have rituals for this sort of thing. Send the priests to exorcize the Mines.
The ritual is a success! Offerings at the Shrine yields +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for {5_Turns}.
I wonder what was causing this trick of the light? We should send a learned man to investigate this.
The glint was a node of ore. Local mines gain +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for {5_Turns}.
Shiny objects you say? Find a prospector at the local market and have him look into this.
The glint was a small outcrop of precious metals. The City's Market yields +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for {5_Turns}.
Why Do We Fight?

Warriors have gathered from all over the Empire to fight in a tournament being held in the City. Everything is ready, and it remains for you to open the games, Your Magnificence.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]To what ends shall we make use of this event?[NEWLINE]
I'm a melee man myself. Let's offer an impressive military position to the victor and their chosen companions.
The surviving gladiators enlist in the army. Gain an appropriate Unit.
The people are in a celebratory mood. With the right amount of support, this event could become part of our national heritage.
The games are the most memorable event in living memory. The Arena gains +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism for {5_Turns}.
Make sure representatives from the local City States are invited. It should serve as both entertainment and a reminder...
The ferocity of our warriors is sure to earn the respect of the local City States: an Emissary is recruited.
With so many travelers in the City, our merchants will be reaping the benefits for some time to come.
Increased trade from the event boosts yields in the City: +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for {5_Turns}.
And how can man die better? As is proper, we will dedicate the fight to the memory of our ancestors and the glory of our gods!
Offerings from the festival generate +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for every 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population for {5_Turns}.
The Glory of Fighting
Provides a short term boost to [ICON_PEACE] Faith in the City.
An Eye For An Eye

Some criminals who claim they are falsely accused of murder and theft are petitioning the throne. They claim that they cannot get a fair trial and are being subjected to mob rule. What is your decision, my Lord?
Let the mob decide: An eye for an eye!
[ICON_BULLET]25% Chance of a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Short [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] We Love The King Day![ENDCOLOR]
Only through divine intervention can they be saved.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_InstantYield}[ENDCOLOR]
The criminals have offered to pay a large settlement to make the claims go away.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_InstantYield}[ENDCOLOR]
An eye for an eye leaves the whole world blind.
50% chance for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for {5_Turns}[ENDCOLOR] after a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Short [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance.[ENDCOLOR]
{2_City} starts a We Love the King Day!
{2_City} starts a We Love the King Day!
The mob rises up for justice in {2_City}, bringing joy to the citizenry.
Mob rule in {2_City}!
